The Lexar JumpDrive Dual Drive D400 128GB USB 3.1 Type-C Pen Drive allows you to carry your important files with you when you're on the go. You get access to 128GB of storage space on this USB flash drive, which is sufficient for documents, pictures, and presentations. You can transfer files swiftly to and from your computer using JumpDrive's increased data transfer rates of up to 130 MB/s provided by the USB 3.1 Gen 1 interface. The JumpDrive's USB-C connector is shielded by the durable metal structure, eliminating possible harm as you travel to your next location. Leveraging USB 3.0 technology, it enables quick and easy storage with high-performance speeds of up to 100MB/s1, saving you time.
